confirmation.signOut.brief: When you sign out, you'll need your Secret Key to sign back in. Only sign out if you've backed up your Secret Key.
confirmation.signOut.backupWarn: If you haven't backed up your Secret Key, you will lose all your funds.
confirmation.signOut.checkBackUpSecretKey: I've backed up my Secret Key
confirmation.signOut.checkPasswordNoLongerWork: I understand my password will no longer work for accessing my wallet upon signing out

screen.sendAsset-form.noteAboutTestnet: This is a Bitcoin testnet transaction. Funds have no value.
screen.sendAsset-chooseFee.brief: Chosen fee will affect your sending amount

modal.editNonce.brief: If your transaction has been pending for a long time, its nonce might not be correct.
